alert.note: Alert for Clay; Kittson; Norman; West Marshall; West Polk; Wilkin (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 18 at 8:56PM CST until January 19 at 12:00AM CST by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT CST TONIGHT... ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO NOON CST THURSDAY... ...BLIZZARD WARNING WILL EXPIRE AT 9 PM CST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory, blowing snow expected. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. For the Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 45 below zero. * WHERE...Portions of northwest and west central Minnesota and eastern North Dakota. * WHEN...For the Wind Chill Advisory, from midnight tonight to noon CST Thursday. For the Winter Weather Advisory, from 9 PM this evening to midnight CST tonight. * IMPACTS...Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes.
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling, especially in open areas. Use caution while outside. Wear appropriate winter clothing. The latest road conditions for North Dakota can be found at dot.nd.gov/travel and for Minnesota at 511mn.org, or by calling 5 1 1 in either state.

area.areaDesc: Clay; Kittson; Norman; West Marshall; West Polk; Wilkin
